  • Constructor Details

    • Message

      Message(String messageName, String messageID, int totalBytes, CcddClassesDataTable.Message parentMessage, List<CcddClassesDataTable.Message> subMessages)
      Constructor for the message class
      Parameters:
      messageName - Message name
      messageID - Message ID
      totalBytes - Size of the initial number of bytes in the message
      parentMessage - Parent of the sub-message; null if this is not a sub-message
      subMessages - Sub-message initialization; null if this is not a parent message

    • Message

      messageID - Message ID

      Parameters:
      subMessageName - Sub-message name
      subMsgID - Sub-message ID
      bytes - Size of the initial amount of bytes in the message
      msg - Parent of the sub-message
